content.description: Sit start with left on a small ledge and right on a side pull. Work up and right on sloping ledges to a right facing flake and top out above. This problem is an instant classic!
content.location: On the southern end of the east face, just right of a chest high ledge and left facing corner.

content.description: Start with left hand on an undercling and right in a bucket at chest height. Climb up onto the ledge and then mantle to top out.
content.location: On the southeast corner of Ambush at a chest high ledge and right facing corner above.

content.description: Start with left hand on a side pull and right on a crimp at head height. Climb up and left to top out.
content.location: On the east side of Ambush, just left of the low arete and below a right facing corner 8 feet up.

content.description: Start with your left in a dish, right on the arete, and use the shin high block at the base of the ramp for a foot. Climb up and left then top out above.
content.location: On the east side of Ambush, just left of the low arete and below a right facing corner 8 feet up.

content.description: Start with left hand in a two finger pocket and right on an undercling. Make powerful moves to the top.
content.location: On the north side of Ambush is a flake that forms a left facing corner. This is Full Metal Jacket.

content.description: At shin height there is a flat triangular step. Use this to climb up onto the ramp and then straight up to top out.
content.location: On the northeast corner on a left rising ramp.

content.description: At shin height there is a flat triangular step. Use this to climb up onto the ramp into the right facing corner to top out.
content.location: On the northeast corner on a left rising ramp.

content.description: Start with left on a crimp and right on a side pull. Climb up and right to top out.
content.location: On the east side of Ambush, about 6 feet left of the ramp.

content.description: Named because of the hunterâ€™s chair that has been sitting on its top for many years, used to ambush whitetail deer. The chair is still on top.
